sqlextractor.SqlExtractor module¶

class sqlextractor.SqlExtractor.MybatisInlineSqlExtractor(dir, encoding='utf-8')¶

Bases: sqlextractor.SqlExtractor.SqlExtractor

Class for inline-mybatis sql extractor

static find_right_paren_pos(content)¶
static get_selects_from_text(content)¶
get_sqls()¶

This function extracts sqls from the java files with mybatis sqls.

Returns:
A list of SQL. For example: [SQL(‘’, u’select a.id, b.name from db.ac a join db.bc b on a.id=b.id or a.id=b.iid where a.cnt > 10’)]

static remove_params(content)¶
class sqlextractor.SqlExtractor.MysqlGeneralLogSqlExtractor(log_path)¶

Bases: sqlextractor.SqlExtractor.SqlExtractor

Class for mysql-general-log sql extractor

get_sqls()¶

This function extracts sqls from mysql general log file.

Returns:
A list of SQL. For example: [SQL(‘’, u’select a.id, b.name from db.ac a join db.bc b on a.id=b.id or a.id=b.iid where a.cnt > 10’)]

class sqlextractor.SqlExtractor.SqlExtractor¶

Bases: object

Base class for sql extractor

get_sqls()¶

This function extracts sqls.

Returns:
A list of SQL. For example: [SQL(‘’, u’select a.id, b.name from db.ac a join db.bc b on a.id=b.id or a.id=b.iid where a.cnt > 10’)]
class sqlextractor.SqlExtractor.TextSqlExtractor(path)¶

Bases: sqlextractor.SqlExtractor.SqlExtractor

Class for file sql extractor

get_sqls()¶

This function extracts sqls from the text file.

Returns:
A list of SQL. For example: [SQL(‘’, u’select a.id, b.name from db.ac a join db.bc b on a.id=b.id or a.id=b.iid where a.cnt > 10’)]
